name: trending_feed_video_posts_v2
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool social_media_data_tt.
Tool description: Social Media Data API in Real-Time.  -Get very useful and unique information.  -I'm on Telegram https://t.me/logicBuilder News and announcements Telegram Channel https://t.me/logicApi
API description: Get trending feed V2. 

V2 - returns more data then older version of the endpoint, video without watermark and etc

- Endpoint will return an array of objects with very useful metadata. 
- Direct urls to the video , statistics and more.

limit.description: The maximum number of records to return. Defaults to 12. Must not exceed 12.

max_cursor.description:
Pagination cursor. 
To get next batch of videos, paste here **max_cursor** value that you have received in previous request response.
